title: Shemot Rabbah
text: And Aaron spoke all the words (Ex. 4:30).  He did as God commanded.  And he will speak for thee unto the people (4:16).  And he did the signs in the sight of the people, which God had told him previously to do.  And the people believed.  They did as God had said: And they shall hearken to your voice (3:18).  Do not conclude that they believed after they had seen signs
